data.text: @MyLibraryThings Thanks Gloria. Hoping tomorrows a better day.
@ammysin Oh no! That’s sucks. Sending good thoughts and positive vibes for a speedy recovery.
@Socialllama81 I know right. All my flying etc at Xmas and I get it from a bastard spreading it around out here with no consequences. Thankfully kids are on the mend. I’m headed back to bed. xcxc
@ammysin Ugh I’m sorry honey! It just takes one negligent bugger - and you who live in the boonies gets it 🤷🏻‍♀️

@Krissy_Kurtsie We’re a house full of mucus now. Cordy seems fully better. Knew it wouldn’t keep her down. Haha. Not what I want to be doing to be honest(would love to be in bed) but the mum is up pulling a calf right now. #RanchLife xx
@ammysin At least the symptoms remain easing but still sending you cuddles to feel 100% well. Can’t image it’s easy going through and looking after the kids x
@pinkstargirl_85 Oh god you poor thing. I’m hoping this doesn’t linger too long. Hope you’re feeling better now. Xx
@ammysin Lovely 🤣🤣🤣 (I've had a 1 week cold, 3 week chest infection then another 1.5 week cold so I can relate!) Xx
@pinkstargirl_85 Thanks lovely. It’s all about the mucus now. Haha. Sorry. TMI xx
@ammysin Oh no! I'm sorry to hear that, hope you all feel better very soon xx
